bug.author: brangl
bug.summary: Header not preserved when converting DICOM to NRRD
bug.description: üêõBug When converting a DICOM image to a NRRD with torchio, the header is not preserved. To reproduce import numpy as np import torchio folder = 'C:/Users/br888855/OneDrive/test_image/000055_V0_TLC' image = torchio.Image(folder) image.save(folder[-13:] + '.nrrd') Expected behavior Saving the DICOM image into NRRD format, with the voxel dimensions and origin preserved. An NRRD image is actually saved, but the header is replaced by a default header. Here is an example of the original DICOM header: (0008, 0005) Specific Character Set CS: 'ISO_IR 100' (0008, 0008) Image Type CS: ['DERIVED', 'SECONDARY', 'SECONDARY'] (0008, 0016) SOP Class UID UI: Secondary Capture Image Storage (0008, 0018) SOP Instance UID UI: 9999.127610772590878094056245959212653167552 (0008, 0020) Study Date DA: '20181017' (0008, 0021) Series Date DA: '20181017' (0008, 0030) Study Time TM: '190012.154651' (0008, 0031) Series Time TM: '190012.155114' (0008, 0033) Content Time TM: '' (0008, 0050) Accession Number SH: '' (0008, 0060) Modality CS: 'OT' (0008, 0064) Conversion Type CS: 'SYN' (0008, 0090) Referring Physician's Name PN: ' ' (0012, 0062) Patient Identity Removed CS: 'YES' (0020, 000d) Study Instance UID UI: 9999.238834278868760108267553149339469029442 (0020, 000e) Series Instance UID UI: 9999.278148608308335041652636228657133927794 (0020, 0013) Instance Number IS: "5" (0020, 0020) Patient Orientation CS: '' (0020, 0032) Image Position (Patient) DS: [-175.67, -354.67, -563.05] (0020, 0037) Image Orientation (Patient) DS: [1, 0, 0, -0, 1, -0] (0020, 0052) Frame of Reference UID UI: 9999.76588588421518489200806843702721857643 (0028, 0002) Samples per Pixel US: 1 (0028, 0004) Photometric Interpretation CS: 'MONOCHROME2' (0028, 0006) Planar Configuration US: 0 (0028, 0008) Number of Frames IS: "1" (0028, 0010) Rows US: 512 (0028, 0011) Columns US: 512 (0028, 0030) Pixel Spacing DS: [0.660156, 0.660156] (0028, 0100) Bits Allocated US: 16 (0028, 0101) Bits Stored US: 16 (0028, 0102) High Bit US: 15 (0028, 0103) Pixel Representation US: 0 (0028, 0301) Burned In Annotation CS: 'NO' (0028, 1053) Rescale Slope DS: "1.0" (0028, 2110) Lossy Image Compression CS: '00' (7fe0, 0010) Pixel Data OW: Array of 524288 elements TorchIO version 0.17.10
